attributes.action: For post Brexit UK to have its own anti tax avoidance laws.
attributes.additional_details: Because many wealthy do and it has been suggested that this underpins the real motive for Brexit.
attributes.background: To prevent millionaires and billionaires to off shore their wealth outside of the UK tax system.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about tax avoidance, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
